# Joseph O. Udeinya

Canonical URL: https://omasiri.com/

## Summary
Staff+ Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience designing and scaling distributed systems, re-architecting legacy platforms, and leading technical direction across teams.

## Key topics
Distributed systems, microservices, cloud-native architecture, reliability engineering, Kotlin, Java, Redis, AWS, Kafka, Micronaut.
